sourceDesc.p: This place entity template is made available for general use, and is particularly valuable for use within the LEAF-Writer encoding environment (https://leaf-writer.leaf-vre.org/)

head.hi: INSTRUCTIONS FOR USING THE PLACE TEMPLATE

body.p: Please follow these instructions for creating a TEI placeography that can be used for conversion in XTriples. All of your work will be done in the listPerson element structure below. Replace placeholder text with your personography information.

list.head: Preparation: To prepare LEAF-Writer environment for creating your personography
list.item: In LEAF-Writer toolbar, click "Show tags" button. This will help you to see the secion you are creating.
Activate the "Markup" panel on the left side of screen
Activate the "Raw XML" panel on the right side of screen

list.head: Place URI: To provide a URI for place from existing authority source:
list.item: Right-click (control-click) on the standard placeName element
Choose "Convert to Entity Annotation"; from lookup, choose the authority file that aligns with your research

p.hi: REMEMBER TO DELETE THE INSTRUCTIONS ABOVE WHEN YOU HAVE COMPLETED WORK ON THIS FILE.

placeName.name: Preferred Name of Place as aligned with your research
A variant form of the place name by which it also might be known
A deprecated or historical form of the place name that is no longer in use

address.country: Three letter code for country, optional

location.geo: Add latitude and longitude in decimal format (53.226658 -0.541254)

place.idno: Replace with the URI for an authority that provides a @sameAs relationship to your place
